1370: Herardus moved to Appel Marckt.A.1 after marriage.
Got married to Aleberna at age 26 in 1370.
1372: Had a son with Aleberna, Herardus, at age 28.
1373: Had a daughter with Aleberna, Nimme, at age 29.
1374: Had a son with Aleberna, Firiin, at age 30.
1375: Had a daughter with Aleberna, Emmelina, at age 31.
1378: Had a daughter with Aleberna, Gloria, at age 34.
1379: Had a daughter with Aleberna, Saxiardis, at age 35.
1380: Had a daughter with Aleberna, Heilsota, at age 36.
1381: Had a daughter with Aleberna, Atghardis, at age 37.
Became caretaker of Herardus, Nimme, Firiin, Emmelina, Gloria, Saxiardis, Heilsota, Atghardis at age 38.
1385: Lost daughter Heilsota when Heilsota was 6 years old.
1392: Lost daughter Nimme when Nimme was 20 years old.
Lost daughter Emmelina when Emmelina was 18 years old.
Has seen several of their children die.
